sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_LOG_XH.nextval as logXh from dual
insert into XT_LOG_ACTION(LOG_XH,XTYHFL_DM,CZY_DJXH,XTML_XH,GNMK_DM,ACTION,KSSJ,JSSJ, TIME_USED,SESSION_ID,SERVERIP,SERVERPORT,QTXX) values(#logXh:NUMERIC#,#xtyhflDm:VARCHAR#,#czyDjXh:VARCHAR#,#xtmlXh:NUMERIC#,#gnmkDm:VARCHAR#, #action:VARCHAR#,to_date(#kssj:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),to_date(#jssj:DATE#,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #timeUsed:NUMERIC#,#sessionId:VARCHAR#,#serverip:VARCHAR#,#serverport:VARCHAR#,#qtxx:VARCHAR#)
